update kt_side_effect
umls_concept_id = #{umlsConceptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
meddra_id = #{meddraId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
kind_of_term = #{kindOfTerm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
side_effect_name = #{sideEffectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=BIGINT},
created_way = #{createdWay,jdbcType=INTEGER},
created_by_key = #{createdByKey,jdbcType=CHAR},
created_by_name = #{createdByName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
check_state = #{checkState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
check_report = #{checkReport,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
checked_by_key = #{checkedByKey,jdbcType=CHAR},
checked_by_name = #{checkedByName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
translate_by_key = #{translateByKey,jdbcType=CHAR},
translate_by_name = #{translateByName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where side_effect_key = #{sideEffectKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update kt_side_effect set umls_concept_id = #{umlsConceptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, meddra_id = #{meddraId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, kind_of_term = #{kindOfTerm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, side_effect_name = #{sideEffectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=BIGINT}, created_way = #{createdWay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, created_by_key = #{createdByKey,jdbcType=CHAR}, created_by_name = #{createdByName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

translate_by_key = #{translateByKey,jdbcType=CHAR},
translate_by_name = #{translateByName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
check_state = #{checkState,jdbcType=INTEGER} where side_effect_key = #{sideEffectKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update kt_side_effect set check_state = #{checkState,jdbcType=BIGINT}, checked_by_key = #{checkedByKey,jdbcType=CHAR}, checked_by_name = #{checkedByName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, check_report = #{checkReport} where side_effect_key = #{sideEffectKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT count(side_effect_key) from kt_side_effect where check_state=#{checkState} and created_way=#{createdWay}
SELECT count(side_effect_key) from kt_side_effect where (created_at BETWEEN #{firstTime} and #{currentTime}) AND check_state=#{checkState} and created_way=#{createdWay}
